entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is mentioned as the one who said 'Silly girl' to someone. The description of her shaking her head implies that she is a teacher or authority figure.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as the one who fixed someone's nose back on. The description of her being able to perform this task implies that she is a healer or nurse.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as standing outside his hut, talking to Fang. The description of him having a boarhound and being near the Forbidden Forest implies that he is a gamekeeper or someone who works with magical creatures.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is mentioned as Hagrid's boarhound. The description of him whimpering and straining at his collar implies that he is excited or interested in something.

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey helped someone by fixing their nose back on. This is implied by the sentence 'But Madam Pomfrey fixed her nose back on in the end.'
Hagrid owns Fang, as he is described as standing outside his hut with Fang by his side.
